title: Core Theory
text: Here we will outline core ideas around entanglement witnesses in a condensed matter perspective and present a general framework that can be experimentally applied.

text: Core methods, such as tensor networks and possibly Kernal polynomial methods.

text: Some basics of condensed matter and many body theory that is useful for beginners to the subject.

title: 6  Linear Response Theory
text: Basics of Linear response theory and relevant bits needed to connect the optical conductivity to the current operator. This should be taken from stephens notes.

title: 7  Optical Conductivity
text: Basics of the optical conductivity and how to obtain from the current. Basic Kubo formulas go here also.
